title: Live criteria updates still not working - verify full chain
description: Even after BUG-008, the live criteria progress bar doesn't update during iteration. Need to verify: fswatch running, FIFO working, polling loop running, display update working.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add debug logging to _ralph_start_watcher() to confirm fswatch starts
Add debug logging to _ralph_start_polling_loop() to confirm loop starts
Verify RALPH_CRITERIA_ROW and RALPH_STORIES_ROW are set correctly
Test: Run Ralph, watch criteria bar update from 0/N to 1/N as Claude works
Remove debug logging after confirming fix works
Document in docs/live-updates.md how the system works
